Articles.Content:
Hi, I would like to introduce the Prometheus IIIe, a Mun (and now Minmus) rocket! ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)

**Pictures:**

> 
> Stack waiting on the launch pad:
> 
> ![screenshot5.png](http://i1187.photobucket.com/albums/z399/Dr_foot/screenshot5.png)
> 
> Landed on the Mun:
> 
> ![screenshot6.png](http://i1187.photobucket.com/albums/z399/Dr_foot/screenshot6.png)
> 
> Landed on Minumus:
> 
> ![screenshot7.png](http://i1187.photobucket.com/albums/z399/Dr_foot/screenshot7.png)
> 
> 

**Flight Plan:**

First Stage - Achieve an apogee of 100 Km

Second Stage - Circularize orbit and begin Mun burn

Third Stage - Finish Mun burn, Mun retro-burn, Mun orbital corrections

Fourth Stage (lander) - Land on Mun

Fifth Stage - Return to Kearth

Final Stage - Capsule with parachute for landing

Will upload a youtube video of flight on request.
